name: C. Magic Odd Square
statement:
Find an matrix with different numbers from to , so the sum in each row,
column and both main diagonals are odd.
editorial:
The problem was suggested by Resul Hangeldiyev Resul. The solution can
be got from the second sample testcase. Easy to see that if we place all
odd numbers in the center in form of rhombus we will get a magic square.
C++ solution
